elements.expression:
shape "square" fill="#b00514" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false
| render containerStyle={containerStyle border="1px solid #EEEEEE" borderRadius="10px"}

shape "square" fill="#f2bc33" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false
| render containerStyle={containerStyle border="1px solid #EEEEEE" borderRadius="10px"}

shape "square" fill="#4fbf48" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false
| render containerStyle={containerStyle border="1px solid #EEEEEE" borderRadius="10px"}

shape "cross" fill="#FFFFFF" border="#b00514" borderWidth=9 maintainAspect=false
| render

filters
| essql query="SELECT service.name FROM \"apm*\" where \"processor.event\" = 'error'"
| math "size(service.name)"
| metric {var label_red_box}
  metricFont={font align="right" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=48 underline=false weight="normal"} 
  labelFont={font align="right" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=16 underline=false weight="bold"} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render

filters
| essql 
  query="SELECT service.name FROM \"apm*\" where \"processor.event\" = 'transaction' and transaction.duration.us > 2"
| math "size(service.name)"
| metric {var "label_yellow_box"} 
  metricFont={font align="right" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=48 underline=false weight="normal"} 
  labelFont={font align="right" color="#FFFFFF" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=16 underline=false weight="bold"} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render

shape "arrow" fill="#FFFFFF" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=9 maintainAspect=false
| render

shape "triangle" fill="#FFFFFF" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=6 maintainAspect=false
| render

filters
| demodata
| markdown "!" 
  font={font align="left" color="#f2bc33" family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" italic=false size=36 underline=false weight="bold"}
| render

shape "square" fill="#FFFFFF" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false
| render containerStyle={containerStyle border="1px solid #444444" borderRadius="10px"}

image dataurl=null mode="contain"
| render

timefilterControl compact=true column=@timestamp
| render

shape "square" fill="#FFFFFF" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false
| render containerStyle={containerStyle border="1px solid #444444" borderRadius="10px"}
